responses: The Indian Institute of Technology Jammu is located on the north side of Jammu city. The campus is situated on lush green land of Jagti village en-route to Katra via NH-44.

You can reach IIT Jammu by air, rail or road. 

By Air: IIT Jammu is around 17 km away from Jammu Airport. From Jammu Airport, plenty of auto rickshaws and prepaid taxis are available to reach the IIT Jammu Jagti campus.

By Train: Jammu is a railway hub connected to many cities through trains. IIT Jammu is around 13 km away from Jammu Railway Station. From Jammu Railway Station, you can take a bus going to Katra which will drop you in front of the IIT Jammu Jagti Campus or you can take a prepaid taxi or auto rickshaw to reach the campus.

By Bus: IIT Jammu is around 12 km away from Jammu Bus stand. From the Bus Stand, you can take a bus going to Katra which will drop you in front of the IIT Jammu Jagti Campus. Alternatively, you can take a matador, three-wheeler, or taxi to reach IIT Jammu Jagti Campus.

patterns: How is the climatic condition at IIT Jammu?
responses: The Jammu lies 302m above the sea level. In Jammu, the climate is warm and temperate. According to KÃ¶ppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cwa. Jammu, like the rest of north-western India, features a humid subtropical climate, with summer temperatures reaching 46 Â°C (115 Â°F), and temperatures in the winter months occasionally falling below 4 Â°C (39 Â°F). June is the hottest month, while January is the coldest month. Please bring a good quality winter jacket/sweater along with gloves and headcap for the winters. You may also bring an umbrella.

patterns: Does IIT Jammu provide scholarships/financial assistance to the UG Students?
responses:
The Institute offers the following scholarships to undergraduate students:
- Institute UG Scholarship
- Institute Merit-cum-Means Scholarship
- Institute Free ship Scholarship

Quality for Undergraduates in Engineering, Science and Technology (QUEST) https://iitjammu.ac.in/academic-notifications

patterns: What are the documents that are required to be submitted for Registration?
responses:
List of documents to be submitted by new UG students at the time of the physical reporting & Registration at IIT Jammu:
1. 2 copies of latest passport size photograph
2. Receipt of the payment made to JoSAA at the time of seat acceptance
3. Receipt of online payment of balance fees. For online payment, in place of Entry Number, please write your StudentID
4. Receipt of the online payment of mess charges. For online payment, in place of Entry Number, please write your StudentID
5. Self-attested copy of Aadhar (student)
6. Seat allotment letter (note down JEE-Adv Roll Number and JEE-adv rank)
7. The original 12th mark sheet and certificate and one self-attested copy
8. The original 10th mark sheet and certificate and one self-attested copy
9. The original category certificate (for OBC-NCL / SC / ST as applicable) and one self-attested copy.
10. The original PwD certificate and one self-attested copy. Medical examination will be done by institute medical officer
11. The original EWS certificate in JoSAA format (as produced during seat allotment)
12. Print out of online application form.
13. FORM A- Undertakings of awareness of academic rules at IIT Jammu
14. FORM B & C- Family Income Statement
15. Self-Declaration: Affidavit on Rs.10 Non Judicial stamp paper duly attested by Notary.
16. Form D- Undertakings by the Parents and Student (Offline Mode)
17. FORM E - Hostel declaration form

patterns: Do all students need to fill Form B, C and Self Declaration?
responses: If your income category is above 5 lakhs and you are not claiming for any concession/ scholarship from the Institute you need not to fill Form C and Self Declaration. However, Form B is to be filled by students of all income categories.

patterns: What is the procedure for Registration?
responses: The detailed list of documents as mentioned above has to be uploaded during online Registration on E-Gov portal (link will be shared on email) by the students. The same documents will be required to be produced by the students at the time of physical reporting for verification. Failure to produce the genuine documents at the time of physical reporting will lead to cancellation of the candidature.

patterns: What are the instructions for the preparatory students?
responses: Please visit the link https://iitjammu.ac.in/ug-admissions

patterns: What are the efforts made by the Institute towards Student Placements?
responses: The prime role of the Training and Placement office is to bridge the gap between the industry leaders of today and the budding leaders of tomorrow. It will continuously be engaged in inviting companies to our campus and will make a rigorous effort to build a long term relationship with the organization. Kindly visit the link for details https://iitjammu.ac.in/cds

patterns: How is Campus life at IIT Jammu?
responses: IIT Jammu offers plenty of opportunities for the holistic development of Students. Apart from intensive academics with regular classes, assignments and quizzes, students are encouraged to pursue extra-curricular activities of their choice throughout the year. For details, please visit https://iitjammu.ac.in/life@iitjammu

patterns: Do students get hostel accommodation and Mess availability at the time of reporting?
responses:
All PG/UG students at IIT Jammu shall be provided hostel accommodation when they report at the institute.

Student will dine in their allotted mess at the time of reporting and charges will be adjusted against the deposit mess advance.

patterns: What furniture and fixtures are provided in student room?
responses:
Institute shall provide a bed, an almirah, a table, and a chair to each student accommodated in the hostel.

There shall be stalls by vendors to purchase a mattress, bucket, mug, and some essential items. A Tuck shop is located in the campus for daily needs. Students/parents can make their own arrangements as well.
Accompanying parents are not allowed to stay in the Hostels.

patterns: Can ITR be submitted in place of Income certificate?
responses: No, student needs to upload latest income certificate. ITR shall not be accepted in place of income certificate.
Student Id and Entry number are same and will be available once you login on E-Governance.

patterns: What is the fee refund policy for UG students?
responses: As Institute receives the final list of students from JOSAA, who have secured admission, after the last round of admission, no refund of fee shall be allowed in case of withdrawal and only the security amount will be refunded.

patterns: What are the responsibilities of the ICC?
Tell me about the ICC's responsibilities
What is the role of the ICC?
responses: The ICC is responsible for receiving complaints of sexual harassment and conducting inquiries into them. It acts as an internal mechanism for redressal and plays a vital role in sensitizing employees about their rights and educating them about the prevention of sexual harassment. The ICC's duties extend beyond addressing complaints; it also plays a proactive role in promoting awareness, preventing sexual harassment, and creating a work culture that is respectful and free from harassment.

Prof. Renu Nanda is the Presiding Officer of the ICC. She is the Head of the Department (Education) at the University of Jammu, located at Baba Saheb Ambedkar Road, Jammu Tawi (J&K). You can reach her via email at listenrenu@yahoo.com.
Dr. Riya Bhowmik is a Member of the ICC and is affiliated with the PIC, ICC at IIT Jammu. You can contact her at riya.bhowmik@iitjammu.ac.in.
The Registrar serves as the Convener of the ICC. You can reach the Registrar at registrar@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: What is the role of the IEC?
responses: The Institute Ethics Committee (IEC) of IIT-Jammu is an independent committee under the Dean, Research and Consultancy. The IEC, IIT-Jammu, is responsible for the scrutiny and approval of all research projects involving human subjects. It ensures that ethical principles are followed in the collection of experimental data, the analysis of such data, and the maintenance of security and confidentiality of subject data. The IEC ensures that the rights of human research subjects are always protected.

patterns: Tell me about the SC/ST Cell
What does the SC/ST Cell do?
Can you explain the SC/ST Cell?
What is the purpose of the SC/ST Cell?
responses: The SC/ST Students Cell addresses academic and non-academic issues and complaints received from students in reserved categories. The institute strives to maintain an environment where all communities can participate in academic and research activities without any sort of discrimination with respect to caste or creed. The SC/ST students cell is responsible for sensitizing the campus community about the importance of diversity.

patterns: What is the prevention of caste-based discrimination?
How does the SC/ST Cell prevent caste discrimination?
Tell me about caste-based discrimination prevention
What is done to prevent caste-based discrimination?
responses: The officials, faculty, and staff members should desist from any act of discrimination against SC/ST students on the grounds of their social origin. All stakeholders should be more sensitive while dealing with such incidents of caste discrimination.

patterns: Who is the Liaison Officer for SC/ST at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the SC/ST Liaison Officer
Who handles SC/ST issues at IIT Jammu?
responses: Dr. Rimen Jamatia is the Liaison Officer for SC/ST at IIT Jammu.

patterns: Where can I find the UGC Circular on caste-based discrimination?
Give me the link to the UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination
I need the UGC Circular on caste-based discrimination
responses:
Here are the links to the UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination:
- [UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination (English)](https://iitjammu.ac.in/scst/Caste%20Based%20Discrim2018-2019(English).pdf)
- [UGC Circular on Prevention of Caste-Based Discrimination (Hindi)](https://iitjammu.ac.in/scst/Caste%20Based%20Discrimination(Hindi)2018-19.pdf)

patterns: Where can I find the SC/ST complaint form?
Give me the SC/ST Cell Complaint form link
How can I file a complaint with the SC/ST Cell?
responses: You can access the SC/ST Cell Complaint Form [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSftvdQhoA--mUx-b9Rn42a3cV3NbJI_bW1gJhparNb-39cplw/viewform).

patterns: Give me information about IIT Jammu
Tell me the address of IIT Jammu
Who is the head of IIT Jammu?
responses: Indian Institute of Technology Jammu is located at Jagti, NH-44, PO Nagrota Jammu-181221 J&K, India. For more details, visit [IIT Jammu's Website](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/).

patterns: Who is the Director of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the Director of IIT Jammu
responses: The Director of IIT Jammu is Prof. Manoj Singh Gaur. He joined on 29 June 2017. You can contact him via email at director@iitjammu.ac.in or call 0191-257-0380. For more information, visit [Director Profile](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/director-profile).

patterns: What is the vision of IIT Jammu?
What is the mission of IIT Jammu?
responses: The vision of IIT Jammu is to create tomorrow's world through technological interventions that are humanistic, creative, and futuristic. The mission is to Learn, Engage, Invent, and Create Impact.

patterns: What are the functions and duties of IIT Jammu?
Tell me the functions of IIT Jammu
What are the responsibilities of IIT Jammu?
responses: IIT Jammu operates under the Institutes of Technology Act 1961, The Institutes of Technology (Amendment) Act, 2016, and The First Statutes of IIT Jammu, 2017. The complete document can be found [here](https://iitjammu.ac.in/homepage/IIT%20ACT/First%20Statutes-913-977%20-%20IIT%20JAMMU.pdf).

patterns: What are the administrative committees of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the committees in IIT Jammu
responses: IIT Jammu has several administrative committees such as the Board of Governors, Finance Committee, Building and Works, and Senate. You can find more details on the [IIT Jammu website](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/).

patterns: What is the total budget of IIT Jammu?
How much is the budget of IIT Jammu?
Tell me the budget details of IIT Jammu
responses: The total budget of IIT Jammu is Rs. 458.30 crores. The breakdown includes: OH-31: Rs. 28.50 Cr, OH-35: Rs. 395.14 Cr, OH-36: Rs. 34.66 Cr.

patterns: What is the budget for tours at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about foreign and domestic tours at IIT Jammu
responses: No separate budget is allotted for tours. Tours include places like Bangalore, Bhubaneshwar, Hyderabad, etc. The expenditure follows the institute's rules.

patterns: Who are the RTI officers at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about RTI officers at IIT Jammu
responses: The RTI officers at IIT Jammu are Dr. Shivnath Mazumder (CPIO) and Dr. Durai Prabhakaran R T (FAA). Contact CPIO at cpio@iitjammu.ac.in and FAA at faa@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: How can I get information from IIT Jammu?
Tell me about information dissemination at IIT Jammu
responses: Information from IIT Jammu is disseminated through their [website](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/rti) and email at cpio@iitjammu.ac.in. Details are available upon request.

patterns: What kind of training programs are offered at IIT Jammu?
Tell me about training programs at IIT Jammu
responses: IIT Jammu offers short-term training programs and expert sessions. Employees are encouraged to participate in these training programs.

patterns: What is the third-party audit date of IIT Jammu?
Tell me about the third-party audit at IIT Jammu
responses: The third-party audit for IIT Jammu is scheduled for 28 June 2024. The audit report will be available on the website.
